integration_id.description: A processing platform or data catalog id as configured in your PACE server

resource_path.description: A resource path to list resources under. If empty, the root path is used.

skip.description: The provided skip value of the request. skip represents records to skip before returning results. If empty, skip is 0.

page_size.description: The provided page_size value of the request. If empty, page_size is 10.

page_token.description: use this to start from a certain page.

getstrm.pace.api.paging.v1alpha.PagePara.title: Page Parameters
getstrm.pace.api.paging.v1alpha.PagePara.description: The parameters of a request, as provided by the client, intended for RPCs that support paging.
